description: Sets the entity's visual size multiplier. A value of 1.0 means normal size, 0.5 is half size (commonly used for baby mobs), and values above 1.0 make the entity larger.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The scale multiplier for visual size. 1.0 = normal, 0.5 = half (babies), 2.0 = double size.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The value of the scale. 1.0 means the entity will appear at the scale they are defined in their model. Higher numbers make the entity bigger.
